aboutMe: I’m Nima, a web developer specializing in JavaScript, React, and Node.js. My experience covers building interactive user interfaces, developing RESTful APIs, and optimizing applications for scalability and performance. I’m committed to clean code principles, modern architecture, and user-centered design. I perform well in collaborative environments and enjoy leveraging new technologies to deliver innovative solutions. My goal is to create software that combines technical excellence with a seamless user experience.
